author: Luz Morales
text: 'Best place for food & they deliver.There wings are amazing.They are aways on point with everything.Great customer service also.'

author: Melly Blanco
text: 'Best food ever üòâI love the meatballs and pizza üçï'

author: Christopher abramson
text:
"BUYER BEWARE!

When this food was delivered and I opened the first container I heard cries of despair and anguish from my closet - all of my clothes were openly weeping.

They all knew they wouldn't fit me for long
column5: because I had found the best wings in the area..."

author: Lynn Hobson (Money Lynn)
text: 'This place has THE best lemon pepper wings on the planet! Try them! Whenever I am expecting company
column5: I order a platter of wings to go along with my sides and they are a hit!'

text: 'Food was not cooked all the way and gave my roommate food poisoning. Go elsewhere!'

text: 'Nice guy
column5: took my order even though they closed. Thank you

author: Abinesh kumar K
text: 'I was there to get a "Too Good to go" order
column5:
but they gave a slice of pizza and 2 garlic knots for 4$ I paid on the "too goo to go" app.

I am sure a slice of pizza doesn't cost 4$.

They are making money off of the Too good to go app
column6: instead of keeping the word of giving items worth about 10$-15$ for 4$ because they are too good to go.'

author: Steven Normandia
text: 'I brought a slice of pizza and found hair on it. Also place was very dirty.and Horrible service.I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place.'

text: 'Our family favorite for mild wings and fries.'

text: 'Tried a slice mozzerella sticks boneless chicken and seasoned fries... Everything was blah.. No flavor or soggy.. Wasted like 25 bucks smh.. Not a go to at all..'

text: 'Soggy and un interesting. :('

author: Robert Smith
text: "The entire place is gross. I'm not a picky eater either. No sauce on the pizza
column5: which looked old from the get go
column6: wings were really plain. Shouldn't have to rely on sauces for good wings. Not a fan and will not go back. Fyi

author: Martha fernandez
text: "Love all the wing sauce flavors
column5: the place feels a tad bit small
column6: but homey and very chill. The Wings taste as fresh as I've ever tasted! Probably the best wing place in Hoboken!!"

text: 'Best wings'

text: 'The wings here are delicious!  Very tasty and fresh. Definitely going back.'

text: 'Wings were kind of small. But the sauces are good and the staff is very nice.  Average price:$1 a wing.'

text: 'Best wings I ever had ! Highly recommended.'

text: 'We usually get the plain pizza and beef patties from this place. They taste good. The guy who‚Äôs making pizzas and stuff is friendly.'

text: 'Wings and buffalo fries... the best! The chef working there is really nice.'

author: Brandon ‚Äúbranondi‚Äù E
text: "Absolute worst chicken tenders I've ever eaten"

author: Avrina Anderson
text: 'Hands down
column5: my favorite wings spot in Jersey! First visited this spot in 2015 and I still do now! Try the Asian Fusion wings and Buffalo fries with seasoning! üòÅ\nYou will experience true inner peace lol!'

author: Barney Simon
text: 'The Italian pasta specially these are great the pies are good too. Sometimes the chicken cutlets are overdone.'

author: wilfredo magtibay
text: 'Delicious'

text: "Great food and wings I'm going back again definitely."

author: Desiree Reyes
text: 'Always polite and efficient ask service and not to mention yummy food'

author: James O'Donnell
text: 'The BEST wings. Crispy skin as well as bomb flavors'

author: Naveen Thattil
text: "I've been here at least two dozen times over the years. The food is about what you would expect. For the price
column5: it's not a bad option if you need something quick and cheap. The family that runs it is very friendly and nice. I was surprised to read that people had bad customer service experiences. This is one of the few places in Hoboken I've never had a bad experience."

author: Joe Vindigni
text: 'Best food in Jersey. I drive and hour to get thereüëå'

author: Zin Mot
text: "Pizza looked really old. Crust is tasty but cheese and sause are not balanced. When my slices came out of oven they were kind of burnt and dry. If you're extremely drunk and you just wanna eat something it's a good place but if you want to eat pizza and enjoy your pizza go somewhere better."

author: Nick Vogiazithakis
text: 'Have t o try garlic parm wings!! Omg'

author: Jasmin Santiago
text: 'Horrible pace just spend 20 dollars on wings supposed to be 20 pieces but small cut and wire tasted like vinagre what a waste of time and money'

author: Colin Nisbet
text: 'Wings are very good and so is pretty much everything else. Have not had a bad experience here. Workers are also very friendly'

author: Sasikanth Kancherla
text: "The cashier was rude and stand offish for no particular reason. The food was very mediocre. My biggest complaint is that their kitchen did not look clean. I saw one cook blow his nose and then continue to prepare food without washing his hands. I don't plan on ever returning.\n\nThe Little Market next door is vastly better if you need some hot food in a pinch."

author: 3dplanet100: walking and tours videos
text: 'Sometimes the pizza is good. Sometimes
column5: its not too good. And sometimes its terrible. And sometimes is yummy. Its sucks when you go to a place and not know how the food is gonna be this time. Now i go to somewhere else
column6: which i know that the food is goona be excellent

author: Antstark7
text: 'Don\'t waste your time they charge you an arm and a leg for tiny size "boneless" chicken and the wings are almost like the regular frozen brand you buy at supermarket.'

author: Mohamed Mohamed
text: 'Terrible food
column6: stay away. First time customer got a hot sandwich which was unedible. Refused me a refund.'

text: "The best stuff shells I've had in this placeüëçüèª"

author: Mike Casella
text: "I regularly order wings and pizza from wings to go because they are normally some of the best wings in town for delivery and price. Recently however the quality of the wings has suffered. They are either burnt or double fried or the oil needs changed. Not so good. Better shape up or I'll find another regular joint."

author: Matthew Hartsough
text: "Wings were a good size but didn't have tons of flavor. The mild wings didn't taste like they had any sauce on them. Wouldn't go back. Good quality celery and blue cheese included at no extra cost."
